blocks.name: ralralimp
blocks.content: Selecting one of two alternatives within a restricted generalization if one of the alternatives is false. (Contributed by AV, 6-Sep-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralralimp(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1))), w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  syld(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1))), w2, wral(s0, c0, w2))
  ralimdv(s0, c0, wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1)), w2)
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wa(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(w1)), w2))
  ornld(w0, w1, w2)
  adantl(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wral(s0, c0, w2), w2))
  rspn0(s0, c0, w2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralralimp(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→(∀(s0 ∈ c0,((w0 →(w1 ∨ w2))∧ ¬ w1))→ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  syld((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,((w0 →(w1 ∨ w2))∧ ¬ w1)), w2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, w2))
  ralimdv(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ((w0 →(w1 ∨ w2))∧ ¬ w1), w2)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, (((w0 →(w1 ∨ w2))∧ ¬ w1)→ w2))
  ornld(w0, w1, w2)
  adantl(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, w2)→ w2))
  rspn0(s0, c0, w2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
